Invocation Name: baby shush
des:
Baby Shush is designed to gently soothe your baby to sleep, replicating the comforting sound of a parent's shushing. This skill creates a tranquil environment that mimics the familiar, reassuring atmosphere of being close to a parent, helping to calm and settle your baby. Whether your baby needs a short lull to drift off for a nap or a longer soothing session to settle down at night, Baby Shush provides a hands-free, convenient solution for parents seeking to comfort their little ones. With adjustable duration settings, you can tailor the experience to your baby's needs, ensuring a peaceful rest for both baby and parent.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Baby Shush
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
